item.title: GSoC 2021 Work Product Description for Hydrogen
item.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹, This blog post provides a summary of my net contributions to Hydrogen during the 10 wonderful weeks that were GSoC ‘21. Expected deliverables The general intention of my project was to build a right-panel with various information that could be accessed via the room-menu. More specifically, the goals were to implement: Room Information Panel Memberlist Panel Member Information Panel Share Room View Single Sign-On My mentor (Bruno) correctly suggested that I attempt to implement SSO instead because that had greater utility.

item.title: GSoc Plans and warming up to Hydrogen
item.description: Google Summer of Code 2021 is officially in full swing and I can’t wait to add some nifty features to âœ¨Hydrogenâœ¨. This post is mainly so that I can warm up to the process of writing blogs and share some of my initial thoughts about the codebase. I think now is as good a time as any to announce the goals for the following 10 weeks. I will mostly be concerned with adding a right panel that shows the room details, member list, member details and an awesome UI to share your favorite room with the world (a.

item.title: Hello there!
item.description: I’ll be writing about Hydrogen here as a part of Google Summer of Code.
